name: Yandere Simulator: Loveblood
description:
Welcome to Yandere Simulator : Loveblood! This is a fast paced school simulator, where your goal is to confess to your crush before the other students can! The AI will evolve, make unique decisions, and suprise you in many ways!

WARNING : This game is currently (WIP). This game is also updated frequently, so it will be difficult to keep track of crashes/regressions.

If you encounter a crash, a comment explaining what you were doing before the crash would be very helpful, and allow me to fix it ASAP.

Face off against THREE rivals, 

Increase Yandy's fighting abilities, 

Visit Grannie K,

Kill other students,

Unlock new skills, 

Unlock new perks, 

and much more!

Note : This game is in development. This game will release sometime this year, where all three rivals  and all missing features will be implemented. Also, your graphics card must support Vulkan in order to run this game.
